members.name: SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent.error
members.description: Returns an error code indicating what has gone wrong with a speech synthesis attempt.

parameters.name: canceled
parameters.description: A SpeechSynthesis.cancel method call caused the SpeechSynthesisUtterance to be removed from the queue before it had begun being spoken.

parameters.name: interrupted
parameters.description: A SpeechSynthesis.cancel method call caused the SpeechSynthesisUtterance to be interrupted after it had begun being spoken and before it completed.

parameters.name: audio-busy
parameters.description: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because the user-agent couldn't access the audio output device (for example, the user may need to correct this by closing another application.)

parameters.name: audio-hardware
parameters.description: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because the user-agent couldn't identify an audio output device (for example, the user may need to connect a speaker or configure system settings.)

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because some required network communication failed.

parameters.name: synthesis-unavailable
parameters.description: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because no synthesis engine was available (For example, the user may need to install or configure a synthesis engine.)

parameters.name: synthesis-failed
parameters.description: The operation failed because the synthesis engine raised an error.

parameters.name: language-unavailable
parameters.description: No appropriate voice was available for the language set in SpeechSynthesisUtterance.lang.

parameters.name: voice-unavailable
parameters.description: The voice set in SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice was not available.

parameters.name: text-too-long
parameters.description: The contents of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text attribute was too long to synthesize.

parameters.name: invalid-argument
parameters.description: The content of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.rate, SpeechSynthesisUtterance.pitch or SpeechSynthesisUtterance.volume property was not valid.
